comment: Had her for lab. Very, very nice. Very funny. Good teacher, she was very clear with what she wanted. She explained everything and really wanted to make sure you understood what you are doing. I would definitely take her again, and would recommend her for anyone!

Had her for lab. Very nice woman, i felt like she favored certain people and didn't grade them as harshly as other but thats just me. E-mail her for help and she'll try her best to help you. Goes over prelab so you actually understand what you're doing.

Great lab proffesor, She may not be working fall '10 but if she comes back next '11 you should take her course, I learned more during her prelab then I did in my lecture course which is probably just a testement to how terrible my lecture proffesor is.
Ms.Bayer is a really great professor, and she is very helpful.
